pullRequest.title: Add and fix more null annotations
pullRequest.bodyText: There's also openhab/openhab-addons#7348 to keep the add-ons port working when these annotations get added.

nodes.bodyText: There are some deprecated constructors (see above) passing null values.

The compiler failed without explicitly casting localizedObject. If it's not assigned here and casted as parameter on the line below, the cast would be removed by the auto save actions, making the compiler error again. Using @format:on/off didn't help. 🙁

commit.message:
Add and fix more null annotations

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

beforeCommit.message:

nodes.bodyText: We should get rid of them in a follow-up PR.
